issue.title: Perception Task starts before running state

content.raw:
The problem is that the OnUpdate method calculates its own “elapsedTime” instead of getting it from the parent’s ElapsedTime\(\) method, and it produces this value in a different way, so it really means “time elapsed since the last trial began” rather than “time elapsed since the running state began.” There are two consequences:

* Trials start well before the running state begins. This deviates from the documentation and also means the ObjectChecker is not yet enabled to accept submissions from the teams.
* Times given in the xacro file as <time></time> elements are interpreted as durations, rather than a simulation time at which the object should be spawned \(which is how our documentation describes them.

There is a third related problem, which is that our implementation makes it impossible to spawn multiple objects at once. I will put this in a separate issue.
